title: Caltha poetarum: or The bumble bee. Composed by T. Cutvvode Esquyre
author: Dymoke, Tailboys, attributed name.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Creede, for Richard Oliue,
notes: T. Cutwode, probably a pseudonym, has been identified with Tailboys Dymoke.
The first two leaves are blank except for signature-mark "A" on the first.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
